relevant_findings.general: Sitting comfortably in bed, no distress
relevant_findings.heent: AT/NC, no conjunctival pallor, anicteric sclera, mucus membranes moist
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, non-tender, JVP not elevated on examination of left internal jugular, temporary pacing wire site with dry sanguinous fluid on dressing
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: S1 and S2 normal, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.respiratory: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes or crackles
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-tender, distended (baseline per patient), obese, bowel sounds normoactive
relevant_findings.genitourinary: Dressing overlying left scrotum stained with dry serosanguinous fluid
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 1+ lower extremity edema to mid-shin
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented x3, grossly intact
